name: FatSlash
description:
The player follows a regular city-boy on his journey to the gym. On his adventure, he encounters a bunch of sweet, sweet temptations.  

To not gain extra calories and get outnumbered by the sweet temptations, the player has to help him recist these delicious, mouth watering, heavenly tasting temptations  with his special weapon.

(The game works better in non-fullscreen mode)
